name: Plastic Soul
description:
Plastic Soul is a daily life simulation about living with an android. You play as a man who gets an android from you son to help you move on from your deceased wife. Take care of her and she will take care of you! Progress through the story by interacting with your android and discover the secret behind your wife's death.

Features
  • Busty and THICC android that can interact with!
  • Over 70 2D hand-drawn animated scenes to unlock!
  • A story that'll make you feel probably...

Gameplay
  • Point and click to explore your apartment!
  • Upgrade your android to do more lewd stuff by doing lewd stuff!
  • Train your stamina and strength to last longer and unlock more skills!
  • Progress the story by gaining motivation points and unlocking skills!
